WRITING.TEXT: I got them from a buddy of mine who's into Heliculture and raising snails. I believe he said they were Burgundy Snails.
But why dd he stop at 3299 instead of just going that 1 extra step to 3300!?!?!

WRITING.TITLE: Smash Mouth - All Star, but it's a shitty Chinese bootleg of it.
Smash Mouth - All Star, but it's a shitty Chinese bootleg of it.

WRITING.TEXT: I guess you could say Echo is a house robot.
I threw a little EVOO in with the noodles to prevent sticking and just ladled a hefty amount of sauce on top once they were on the plate.

American here. Just wanted to put out there that not all of us are wearing 10-gallon hats and looking for any excuse to shoot something. Some of us actually think deescalating the situation and capturing criminals is the right thing to do.
